and creamy chicken curry.", imageAlt: "Butter Chicken dish", }, { image: "https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/5/55/Hyderabadi_Biryani.jpg/800px-Hyderabadi_Biryani.jpg", title: return (
